page.title: 20Supernatural & Folklore
page.content: St.Dunstan,Patron Saint of Mayfield Paris Church,is said to have had a forge in Mayfield.Whilst working there Dunstan was visited by the Devil in the form of a woman.Seeing a cloven hoof Dunstan seized the Devil by the nose with his red_hot tongs.The Devil,in agony,fled & cooled his nose in the Mayfield iron_spring which is why the water has contained iron ever since. In November of each year the ghostly figure of a Highwayman,Kit Jarvis,is seen to cross Penny Bridge in Mayfield.Jarvis was also the leader of an 18th century band of smugglers in the area,who always evaded capture until November 1750 when he was finally caught & hung. The High Street in Mayfield is haunted by a ghostly nun who can be seen walking back & forth across the road.
